4875.verse: فَنَادَوْاْ|But they called|120|155|14759$صَاحِبَهُمْ|their companion|125|194|16379$فَتَعَاطَىٰ|and he took|99|168|16380$فَعَقَرَ|and hamstrung.|123|158|16381$

4877.verse: إِنَّآ|Indeed, We|96|107|120$أَرْسَلْنَا|[We] sent|87|109|1342$عَلَيْهِمْ|upon them|90|112|22$صَيْحَةً|thunderous blast|131|153|14475$وَٲحِدَةً|single,|78|100|1853$فَكَانُواْ|and they became|135|146|9833$كَهَشِيمِ|like dry twig fragments|171|327|16382$ٱلْمُحْتَظِرِ|(used by) a fence builder.|192|348|16383$

4878.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|115|640$يَسَّرْنَا|We have made easy|154|170|16357$ٱلْقُرْءَانَ|the Quran|95|111|4239$لِلذِّكْرِ|for remembrance,|136|152|16358$فَهَلْ|so is (there)|102|118|6409$مِن|any|50|58|53$مُّدَّكِرٍ|who will receive admonition?|208|208|16355$

4882.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|115|640$أَنذَرَهُم|he warned them|127|143|16386$بَطْشَتَنَا|(of) Our seizure,|129|145|16387$فَتَمَارَوْاْ|but they disputed|138|154|16388$بِٱلنُّذُرِ|the warnings.|110|118|16365$

4883.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|124|640$رَٲوَدُوهُ عَن|they demanded from him|183|218|16389$ضَيْفِهِۦ|his guests,|92|127|16390$فَطَمَسْنَآ|so We blinded|112|147|16391$أَعْيُنَهُمْ|their eyes.|91|108|5188$فَذُوقُواْ|`So taste|85|167|3154$عَذَابِى|My punishment|119|282|6900$وَنُذُرِ|and My warnings.`|144|226|16356$

4886.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|115|640$يَسَّرْنَا|We have made easy|154|170|16357$ٱلْقُرْءَانَ|the Quran|95|111|4239$لِلذِّكْرِ|for remembrance,|136|152|16358$فَهَلْ|so is (there)|102|118|6409$مِن|any|50|58|53$مُّدَّكِرٍ|who will receive admonition?|208|208|16355$

4888.verse: كَذَّبُواْ|They denied|101|122|2650$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِنَا|Our Signs,|88|131|408$كُلِّهَا|all of them,|95|138|16393$فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُمْ|so We seized them|145|188|5581$أَخْذَ|(with) a seizure|124|146|16394$عَزِيزٍ|(of) All-Mighty,|121|322|16395$مُّقْتَدِرٍ|(the) Powerful One.|151|352|16396$

4891.verse: سَيُهْزَمُ|Soon will be defeated|163|185|16401$ٱلْجَمْعُ|(their) assembly,|132|177|16402$وَيُوَلُّونَ|and they will turn|136|181|16403$ٱلدُّبُرَ|(their) backs.|110|132|16404$

4892.verse: بَلِ|Nay,|50|67|3361$ٱلسَّاعَةُ|the Hour|87|120|5525$مَوْعِدُهُمْ|(is) their promised time,|178|212|16405$وَٱلسَّاعَةُ|and the Hour|106|140|15665$أَدْهَىٰ|(will be) more grievous|170|187|16406$وَأَمَرُّ|and more bitter.|127|127|16407$

4874.verse: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn].

4875.verse: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her].

4876.verse: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

4877.verse: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen.

4878.verse: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

4879.verse: The people of Lot denied the warning.

4880.verse: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn

4881.verse: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful.

4882.verse: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning.

4883.verse: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning."

4884.verse: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment.

4885.verse: So taste My punishment and warning.

4886.verse: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

4887.verse: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning.

4888.verse: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability.

4889.verse: Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scripture?

4890.verse: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]"?

4891.verse: [Their] assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs [in retreat].

4892.verse: But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter.

4893.verse: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness.

4894.verse: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar."

4895.verse: Indeed, all things We created with predestination.
